posts.post_content:
I need these two to complete my T205 set!  

I'm doing a T205 set with all variations (front only - can't afford all the various backs) and am almost done!

Looking for lower grade to keep the cost under control.  Can anyone help me out?

Thanks!

Which Latham variation are you needing? Raw or graded ?


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
The A. Latham version is good since I'm not doing the back variations.  I don't really care if it's slabbed or not.  Either way is fine.
